Description: pRESTO toolkit for immune repertoire analysis.
Galaxy_tool_ids: presto_alignsets, presto_assemblepairs, presto_buildconsensus, presto_collapseseq, presto_filterseq, presto_maskprimers, presto_pairseq, presto_parseheaders, presto_parselog, presto_partition, prestor_abseq3
bio.tool_description: Integrated collection of platform-independent Python modules for processing raw reads from high-throughput (next-generation) sequencing of lymphocyte repertoires.
